content.text:
# Melcombe Regis (ward)

Melcombe Regis is an electoral ward in Dorset. Since 2019, the ward has elected 1 councillor to Dorset Council.
Geography
The Melcombe Regis ward is based on the Weymouth suburb of Melcombe Regis.
